metadata.title: ApeRAG
metadata.description: Production-Ready RAG Platform with Graph, Vector & Full-Text Search.

metadata.title: API keys
metadata.description: This section allows you to securely store, update, and manage API keys for different AI services (such as OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, etc.). Connecting your keys enables personalized AI interactions while keeping your credentials protected.

page_api_keys.api_key_placeholder: Please describe the purpose of an Api Key.
page_api_keys.api_key_description: API keys must be kept confidential (e.g., stored in environment variables) to avoid exploitation or unexpected charges.
page_api_keys.delete_api_key_confirm: Confirm deletion of the API key?

metadata.title: Audit Logs
metadata.description: Track and review all critical system activities with Audit Logs—a detailed record of user actions, API calls, and administrative changes. Ensure transparency, security, and compliance by monitoring who did what, when, and from where.

metadata.title: Applications
metadata.description: ApeRAG is a new chatbot based on local datasets and utilizes multiple large language models.

page_bot.delete_bot_confirm: Deleting the application will remove all sessions under this app. Please confirm the operation!
page_bot.title: Title
page_bot.description_placeholder: Please briefly introduce the purpose of the application.
page_bot.model_description: Setting the default model will serve as the default model for all new sessions.
page_bot.system_prompt_template_description: System Prompt defines the AI's role and behavioral rules, setting the overall context for the interaction.
page_bot.query_prompt_template_description: Query Prompt represents the user's specific input or question, which the AI processes and responds to within the framework set by the System Prompt.

page_chat.rag_description: ApeRAG is a production-ready RAG platform that combines graph, vector, and full-text search for hybrid retrieval, knowledge management, and enterprise AI applications.

feedback.title: Tell Us What You Think
feedback.choose_a_category: Please choose a category for your feedback below.

Harmful.title: Harmful
Harmful.description: Promotes dangerous, violent, or discriminatory acts.

Unsafe.title: Unsafe
Unsafe.description: Contains risky or physically dangerous information.

Unhelpful.title: Unhelpful
Unhelpful.description: Irrelevant, poorly explained, or fails to address the query.

Other.title: Other
Other.description: Any issue not covered by the categories above.

feedback.share_your_feedback_placeholder: Please provide your feedback so we can continue to enhance your experience.

metadata.title: Add collection
metadata.description: By importing and systematically organizing your data sources into a structured dataset, you can significantly improve the contextual understanding and response accuracy of large language models (LLMs)

metadata.title: Collections
metadata.description: By importing and systematically organizing your data sources into a structured dataset, you can significantly improve the contextual understanding and response accuracy of large language models (LLMs)

page_collections.delete_collection_confirm: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete collection and remove your documents from our servers.
page_collections.publish_collection_description: Allow users to discover and subscribe to your collection.
page_collections.unpublish_collection_description: Remove the collection from the marketplace, making it private.
page_collections.name: Name
page_collections.description_placeholder: Please describe the general meaning of a collection.
page_collections.index_types_description: Select the AI capabilities you need, we will build corresponding indexes for your documents

index_type_VECTOR.title: Vector
index_type_VECTOR.description: Represents data (text, images, etc.) as high-dimensional vectors to enable similarity-based retrieval.

index_type_FULLTEXT.title: Fulltext
index_type_FULLTEXT.description: Indexes keywords within text using techniques like inverted indexing for exact or fuzzy

index_type_GRAPH.title: Graph
index_type_GRAPH.description: Stores data as nodes (entities) and edges (relationships), enabling complex relational

index_type_SUMMARY.title: Summary
index_type_SUMMARY.description: Indexes summaries or metadata of long documents instead of raw content for faster

index_type_VISION.title: Vision
index_type_VISION.description: Encodes visual content (images/videos) into feature vectors for content-based retrieval.

page_collections.model_settings_description: Select AI models for document processing. Different index types require different model support
page_collections.embedding_model_description: An embedding model translates data into numerical vectors that capture their semantic meaning and relationships.
page_collections.completion_model_description: A completion model is an AI that generates new content by predicting the most likely subsequent text based on a given input.

page_documents.index_rebuild_should_select_index_type: You have to select at least one item.
page_documents.index_rebuild_failed_confirm: Are you sure you want to rebuild all failed indexes?
page_documents.index_rebuild_tips: You can configure the index types in Settings.
page_documents.delete_document_confirm: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete file and remove your data from our servers.
page_documents.or_click_to_browse_files: Or click to browse (max 10MB for each file)

page_evaluation.delete_evaluation_confirm: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete evaluation and remove your evaluation from our servers.
page_evaluation.retry_all_evaluation_confirm: Are you sure you want to re-evaluate all questions?
page_evaluation.retry_failed_evaluation_confirm: Are you sure you want to re-evaluate these failed questions?

metadata.title: Marketplace
metadata.description: Discover and subscribe to quality knowledge collections shared by community, expand your knowledge boundaries

metadata.provider_description: This section allows you to connect and customize your preferred Large Language Model (LLM) providers and models for personal use. Set up API keys, choose models, and adjust settings to enhance your AI experience.
metadata.model_description: This section allows you to connect and customize your preferred Large Language Model (LLM) providers and models for personal use. Set up API keys, choose models, and adjust settings to enhance your AI experience.

provider.name: Name
provider.base_url_description: The LLM API baseUrl refers to the root endpoint URL used to access a Large Language Model (LLM) API service.
provider.api_dialect_description: Completion API Dialect suggests possible outputs, Embedding API Dialect converts them to vectors, and Rerank API Dialect optimizes their order based on semantic relevance.
provider.api_key_placeholder: Please enter the api key for the model provider.
provider.api_key_description: To access the AI model's capabilities, you need to provide a valid API Key from your chosen model provider. This key serves as a secure authentication method, allowing the system to process your requests while maintaining privacy and usage control.
provider.delete_confirm: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete provider and remove your data from our servers.

page_question_set.delete_question_set_confirm: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete question set and remove your question set from our servers.
page_question_set.delete_question_confirm: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete question.
page_question_set.prompt_template_tips: The following variables will be replaced by the system:
page_question_set.prompt_template_document_content: The content of the document from the collection.
page_question_set.prompt_template_number_of_question: The number of questions to be generated.

metadata.title: Quotas
metadata.description: Manage your usage limits for AI models, API calls, and other resources in this section. Quotas help you control costs, prevent overuse, and optimize your experience.

bot_count.title: Bot Count
bot_count.description: The upper limit for active bots in a system, preventing resource overuse and ensuring stability.

collection_count.title: Collection Count
collection_count.description: The maximum allowed collections in a database, controlling data structure complexity.

document_count.title: Documents Overall
document_count.description: Caps the total documents across all collections, managing overall storage capacity.

documents_per_collection.title: Documents per Collection
documents_per_collection.description: Limits documents per collection, optimizing query performance and data balance.

page_search.delete_confirm: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete search result.
